mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.cfjf AS "cfjf.id", a.cftzd AS "cftzd", a.cfrq AS "cfrq", DATE_FORMAT(a.cfrq,'%Y-%m-%d')AS "cfrqMs" , a.cfdx AS "cfdx", a.cftd AS "cftd", a.cfqxyyz AS "cfqxyyz", a.cfyyms AS "cfyyms", a.cfxczp AS "cfxczp", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.kzzd1 AS "kzzd1", a.kzzd2 AS "kzzd2", a.kzzd3 AS "kzzd3", a.kzzd4 AS "kzzd4", b.name as "cfjf.name", o.id AS "createBy.office.id", o.name AS "createBy.office.name"
left join jf_xx b on b.id=a.cfjf JOIN sys_user u ON u.id = a.create_by JOIN sys_office o ON o.id = u.office_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO jf_cf( id, cfjf, cftzd, cfrq, cfdx, cftd, cfqxyyz, cfyyms, cfxczp, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, kzzd1, kzzd2, kzzd3, kzzd4 ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{cfjf.id}, #{cftzd}, #{cfrq}, #{cfdx}, #{cftd}, #{cfqxyyz}, #{cfyyms}, #{cfxczp}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{kzzd1}, #{kzzd2}, #{kzzd3}, #{kzzd4} )
mapper.update: UPDATE jf_cf SET cfjf = #{cfjf.id}, cftzd = #{cftzd}, cfrq = #{cfrq}, cfdx = #{cfdx}, cftd = #{cftd}, cfqxyyz = #{cfqxyyz}, cfyyms = #{cfyyms}, cfxczp = #{cfxczp}, create_by = #{createBy.id}, create_date = #{createDate}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, del_flag = #{delFlag}, kzzd1 = #{kzzd1}, kzzd2 = #{kzzd2}, kzzd3 = #{kzzd3}, kzzd4 = #{kzzd4} WHERE id = #{id}
